Nagaland.description: Commercial hub and largest city in Nagaland.

Nagaland.description: Cultural and educational center of Ao tribe.

Nagaland.name: Mon
Nagaland.description: Famous for Konyak tribe and hills.

Nagaland.description: Home of Lotha tribe with scenic landscapes.

Nagaland.description: Home of Chakhesang tribe and scenic hills.

Nagaland.name: Peren
Nagaland.description: Tribal district with agriculture and forests.

Nagaland.name: Naga West
